mapper.select: select uca.uid,uca.purchase,uca.totle_income as totalIncome,uca.shared_income as sharedIncome,uca.lotto,uca.level,uca.withdraw_cash as withdrawCash,uca.` difference_income` as differenceIncome from user_cash_assets uca left join dict_computing_power dcp on uca.level = dcp.level where uca.uid = #{uid}
